job_tasks.justification: The job involves creating an AI agent, which is a form of model development focused on generative capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: building the underlying platform to power AI driven workflows
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the development of infrastructure to support AI functionalities, including model integration and execution.

job_tasks.phrase: build out our core service written that hosts and coordinates our AI agents
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the development of a core service to manage and run AI agents, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: making sure the service follows up-to-date best practices for Python web development
job_tasks.justification: This highlights standard software engineering practices for building a web service using Python.

job_tasks.phrase: orchestrating the communication between different services via gRPC
job_tasks.justification: This involves designing and implementing inter-service communication, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: contributing to the core AI functionality
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states involvement in the fundamental AI aspects of the project.

job_tasks.phrase: Write high-quality, efficient, and maintainable code while adhering to best practices and contributing to code reviews
job_tasks.justification: This describes standard software development practices including code quality, efficiency, maintainability, and collaboration through reviews.

job_tasks.phrase: Build a highly scalable web platform based on Python and gRPC that can be deployed in different environments
job_tasks.justification: This outlines the development of a scalable web platform, a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop interactions with the latest LLMs
job_tasks.justification: This involves working directly with Large Language Models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, specifically generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a testing infrastructure that allows us to verify agentic AI behaviours
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on testing AI behaviors, which is part of the model development and evaluation process.

job_tasks.phrase: Embrace continuous learning and stay connected with industry best practices, tools, and technologies around AI to drive improvements in our software.
job_tasks.justification: While focused on learning, the goal is to drive improvements in software using AI technologies, hinting at the need to understand data pipelines or processing for AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Advocate for improvements to product quality, security, and performance
job_tasks.justification: This involves ensuring the software product is of high quality, secure, and performs well, which are software development concerns.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with more Senior Engineers on the architectural plans and technical designs ensuring scalability, performance, maintainability and measurability of our Duo Workflow platform.
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration on architectural design and technical specifications for a software platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in Tier 2 or Tier 3 weekday, weekend, and/or occasional night on-call rotations to assist troubleshooting product operations, security operations, and urgent engineering issues.
job_tasks.justification: On-call rotations for troubleshooting operations and engineering issues are characteristic of operations engineering, which includes MLOps in an AI context.

soft_skills.phrase: Embrace continuous learning and stay connected with industry best practices, tools, and technologies around AI
Collaborate with more Senior Engineers on the architectural plans and technical designs

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building AI-powered agents, designing interactions with LLMs, and developing the underlying platform for AI-driven workflows. This directly aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on generative models and user-facing software systems.
